fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater.connections

Class HeaterSensorDataOutboundPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPort

                • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater.connections.HeaterSensorDataOutboundPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorCI, HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorRequiredPullCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.DataRequiredCI.PullCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.DataRequiredCI.PushCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.DataOutboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class HeaterSensorDataOutboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractDataOutboundPort
implements HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorRequiredPullCI
    The class HeaterSensorDataOutboundPort implements the outbound port for the HeaterSensorDataCI component data interface, and as such must implement the HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorRequiredPullCI pull interface as well as the method receive from the DataRequiredCI.PushCI push interface to call the appropriate client component method to receive data pushed from the server component.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-11-27

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
